PHRASE.LANG: kName
Undead 1st Mate Suit (Male)
Tenue premier matelot mort-vivant (homme)
Anzug: Untoter Offizier (Herren)
Completo Primo ufficiale non morto (Uomo)
Traje de primer oficial no muerto (hombre)
언데드 일등 항해사 의상 (남성)
Undead 1st Mate Suit (Men)
不死大副套裝(男用)
不死大副套裝(男用)
Undead 1st Mate Suit (Male)
kDesc
Master of the seas, and of taking orders from the captain. The first mate has to be a tough skinned fellow, that's why he wears a black vest and is made of bones. [#Legal]
Maître des mers et sous les ordres du capitaine. Le premier matelot doit se forger une carapace, ce qui explique son gilet noir et son apparence osseuse. [#Legal]
Der Offizier ist ein Meister der Seefahrt und unschlagbar im Ausführen von Befehlen. Deshalb trägt er eine schwarze Weste und besteht aus Knochen. [#Legal]
Esperto dei mari, e nel prendere ordini dal capitano. Il Primo ufficiale deve avere la pellaccia dura, per questo indossa una maglia nera ed è fatto di ossa. [#Legal]
Experto marino y fiel servidor del capitán. El primer oficial debe ser un tipo duro, por eso viste una camiseta negra y tiene tanto hueso. [#Legal]
바다의 항해사이자 선장의 명령을 이행하는 자. 일등 항해사는 물러서는 안 됩니다. 그렇기에 항상 검은색을 입고 뼈밖에 없는 거에요. [#Legal]
Master of the seas, and of taking orders from the captain. The first mate has to be a tough skinned fellow, that's why he wears a black vest and is made of bones. [#Legal]
大副能征服大海，並聽從船長的命令。他需要硬朗的性格，所以身穿用骨頭造的黑色背心。 [#Legal]
大副能征服大海，並聽從船長的命令。他需要硬朗的性格，所以身穿用骨頭造的黑色背心。 [#Legal]
Master of the seas, and of taking orders from the captain. The first mate has to be a tough skinned fellow, that's why he wears a black vest and is made of bones. [#Legal]
